column4: How can I hide my IP address from a website? I mean, there's a voting going on. And I can only submit one vote from an ip in every 3 hours. How can I hide my IP so I could vote more?
I'm an ubuntu user. Where could I ask elsewhere? #haxx000rz? For now, it's for cheating. But if I wouldn't have told the reason, it'd be a technical question.
No, it would be off topic still
